ygData.subject: RE: Lambent armor and Solusek Champion
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe the solusel mage (for another piece of lambent armor) and solusek champion are both in sol A. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
i believe the solusel mage (for another piece of lambent armor) and solusek
champion are both in sol A.

Shada


> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Okay, here's a question. For the lambent vambraces one of
> the things you
> need is fiery vambraces from a solusek champion. I know
> there is a kobold
> champion in Solusek B, but this seems like a pretty hard kill
> to aquire this
> item (in comparison to the other pieces). Not having spent
> much time in
> Solusek A, I was wondering if there's a goblin champion there
> that this
> might be referring to instead? Anyone know much about Sol A
> that has an
> answer?
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 47 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
